name: 最后一搏 The last fight
name_original: 最后一搏 The last fight
description:
What kind of game is this[/]

This is a waste soil survival game. The background of the game is that shortly after the outbreak of the zombie epidemic, players play a group of survival maniacs to resist the invasion of zombies and rebuild their homes.

What can I do in the game[/]

Players can kill zombies in the game, search for materials, strengthen their base, and build a self-sufficient ecological home through planting and manufacturing.

What is the current content of the game[/]

At present, the game has developed a small town map, 2 optional characters and several NPC tasks to support planting. Product manufacturing and other functions will be added later.
